explanation: [0-0] Mario, wearing his signature red and blue outfit and red cap, sits at a yellow school desk facing right. A glass wall with a brown frame is to his right, offering a view of tall buildings in the distance. The text "POV: you forgot to close your chrome tabs before class" is displayed at the top of the screen.

[0-4] Mario leans slightly to the right and pulls out a black laptop from under the desk with his left hand. He places it on the desk and opens it. Suddenly, Mario's eyes widen in surprise as he looks to the left.

[4-6] Mario extends both arms to the left and swings them to the right across the desk. The laptop flies through the glass wall, shattering it and sending shards flying.

[6-10] The scene shifts to reveal a menacing bald puppet with an angry expression on its face on the left. Mario, visibly shaken, looks to the left while speaking. The bald puppet raises its left hand and swings it towards Mario. The screen shakes violently as Mario flies off to the right.
